Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using A375-S2 cells expressing the PRKCA R137H variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_001145964.2:c.408C>A;p.(Arg137His) in A375-S2 cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PRKCA cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or no cDNA was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80%.
